description: Show a key data point in an intuitive gauge format, with contextual bands for categorization.

name: nativescript-ui-gauge

scripts.build: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.native
scripts.build.native: npm run build.android && npm run build.ios
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.demo.android: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo && tns run android --bundle --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.angular.android: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.angular.android.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --bundle --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.angular.ios: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.angular.ios.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --bundle --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.ios: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ios.release: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo && tns run ios --bundle --env.aot --env.uglify --env.snapshot --release --key-store-path ../../keystores/testing-key.jks --key-store-password 1234567890 --key-store-alias test --key-store-alias-password 1234567890
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.android && cd ../demo-vue && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm run build.wrappers && npm run build.ios && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-ui-gauge && cd ../src
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-ui-gauge && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.watch: npm run plugin.watch.tsc & npm run plugin.watch.android & npm run plugin.watch.ios
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run build && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
